gmcm.extraWaterChance.name: Chance to water extra tiles
gmcm.extraWaterChance.desc: Probability that a sprinkler splashes additional farmland beyond its default pattern each morning.
gmcm.extraWaterRadius.name: Extra water search radius
gmcm.extraWaterRadius.desc: How far from the sprinkler to look for bonus tiles to water when feeling generous.
gmcm.extraWaterTiles.name: Extra tiles to water
gmcm.extraWaterTiles.desc: Maximum number of extra tiles a helpful sprinkler will try to water when it rolls the generous personality.
gmcm.skipWaterChance.name: Chance to skip tiles
gmcm.skipWaterChance.desc: Probability that a lazy sprinkler leaves some of its normal coverage dry.
gmcm.maxSkippedTiles.name: Skipped tiles
gmcm.maxSkippedTiles.desc: Maximum number of covered tiles that can stay dry when the sprinkler slacks off.
gmcm.fertilizerChance.name: Chance for free fertilizer
gmcm.fertilizerChance.desc: Probability that a sprinkler treats one watered tile with the configured fertilizer item.
gmcm.fertilizerItemId.name: Fertilizer item ID
gmcm.fertilizerItemId.desc: Item ID to apply when the sprinkler sprinkles fertilizer (e.g. 368 for Basic Fertilizer).
gmcm.overflowChance.name: Chance to overflow
gmcm.overflowChance.desc: Probability that a sprinkler splashes water outside its normal range in a chaotic burst.
gmcm.overflowRadius.name: Overflow radius
gmcm.overflowRadius.desc: How far from the sprinkler to look for overflow tiles when chaos strikes.
gmcm.overflowTiles.name: Overflow tiles
gmcm.overflowTiles.desc: Maximum number of extra tiles soaked by an overflow event.
gmcm.growthSpurtChance.name: Chance for growth spurt
gmcm.growthSpurtChance.desc: Probability that a sprinkler hypes up nearby crops, shaving a day off their current growth phase.
gmcm.growthSpurtTiles.name: Growth spurt tiles
gmcm.growthSpurtTiles.desc: Maximum number of crops to energize when a sprinkler goes into hype mode.
gmcm.debugLogging.name: Enable debug logs
gmcm.debugLogging.desc: Adds trace-level log entries describing every lazy or generous action taken.
